title: Crispy Planted Chicken Pita
instructions: Cook the planted.chicken in a hot pan with olive oil until crispy and golden brown, about 4-5 minutes.
Prepare a quick tzatziki by mixing yogurt with grated cucumber, garlic, lemon juice, and fresh dill.
Warm the pita breads in a dry pan or oven for 1-2 minutes until soft and pliable.
Slice the crispy planted.chicken into strips.
Fill each pita with the chicken strips, fresh lettuce, sliced tomatoes, red onion, and a generous drizzle of tzatziki.
Serve immediately with a side of extra sauce for dipping.
